item.title: $ ./about-me
item.description: Hi! Welcome to my about page. I’m Jago Gardiner, mostly known on the internet as nysa[scape, dev], a 16 year old from the UK. I study Computer Science, Photography and Maths at A-Level, and I’m currently in my first year of study. I mostly work in ROM development and kernel development, which is what I’m mostly known for. I’m a beginner security researcher also, and I’m dabbling in some AI development due to my Computer Science class exploring it.

item.title: $ ./contact-me
item.description: If you ever need to contact me, well: I’m pretty much always on Telegram, sometimes I’m busy and may not get around to your message. I sleep mostly from 12/1am - 7/10pm GMT, so I might be asleep. If you don’t have Telegram, no problem. You can always catch me on Instagram, or E-Mail (for formal matters) nysadev@raphielgang.org Any other socials you might find my handle under are not always reliable, and I might not be there to instantly respond.

item.title: $ ./works
item.description: I work on many things, but here is a somewhat list: Acrux kernel - MI 8 Lite MI 8 Lite device trees: Device tree / Vendor tree Procyon kernel - MI A2 Lite (wip) MI 8 Lite Android 10 device organization Lunysa (Lunarixus x nysascape)
